menu.name: Hummus
menu.description: A creamy dip made from blended chickpeas, tahini, lemon, and garlic.

menu.name: Falafel
menu.description: Deep-fried chickpea balls, often served in pita bread with tahini sauce.

menu.name: Moussaka
menu.description: A layered casserole with eggplant, minced meat, tomatoes, and béchamel sauce.

menu.name: Tzatziki
menu.description: A refreshing yogurt-based dip with cucumber, garlic, and dill.

menu.name: Dolma
menu.description: Grape leaves stuffed with rice, pine nuts, and herbs.

menu.name: Spanakopita
menu.description: A Greek spinach and feta cheese pie wrapped in flaky phyllo pastry.

menu.name: Baba Ganoush
menu.description: A smoky eggplant dip blended with tahini, garlic, and lemon juice.

menu.name: Shawarma
menu.description: Marinated and slow-roasted meat served in pita with vegetables and sauce.

menu.name: Greek Salad
menu.description: A fresh salad with tomatoes, cucumbers, olives, feta cheese, and olive oil.

menu.name: Baklava
menu.description: A rich dessert made of phyllo dough, nuts, and honey syrup.

menu.name: Bruschetta
menu.description: Toasted bread topped with tomatoes, basil, garlic, and olive oil.

menu.name: Paella
menu.description: A Spanish rice dish cooked with saffron, seafood, or chicken.

menu.name: Kebab
menu.description: Grilled meat skewers, often served with rice and vegetables.

menu.name: Saganaki
menu.description: Fried Greek cheese served flambéed with lemon juice.

menu.name: Couscous
menu.description: A North African dish of steamed semolina wheat, often served with vegetables and meat.

menu.name: Pita Bread & Labneh
menu.description: Soft flatbread served with strained yogurt dip.

menu.name: Ratatouille
menu.description: A French Provençal vegetable stew made with eggplant, zucchini, and tomatoes.

menu.name: Pastitsio
menu.description: A Greek baked pasta dish with layers of minced meat and béchamel sauce.

menu.name: Harira Soup
menu.description: A Moroccan soup with tomatoes, lentils, chickpeas, and spices.

menu.name: Fattoush
menu.description: A Lebanese bread salad with crisp vegetables and sumac dressing.
